definitions.definition: out of place , incompatible , inharmonious , not congruent
examples: The yellow blazer was incongruent for the funeral.
Her knowledge of world politics was incongruent in someone so young.

definitions.definition: of or relating to two numbers that have different remainders when divided by a third number

main_definition: out of place , incompatible , inharmonious , not congruent
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) of or relating to two numbers that have different remainders when divided by a third number
